file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 21-23-01-04 - CONFIG-2 - GASPER SHUTOFF VALVE - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL GASPER SHUTOFF VALVE - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove/install the gasper shutoff valve. B. The gasper shutoff valve is installed under the passenger cabin floor, in the line that sends conditioned air to the gasper fan. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ACFT MODEL(S) 21-23-01-000-802-A GASPER SHUTOFF VALVE - REMOVAL EMB-135 ACFT MODEL(S) GASPER SHUTOFF VALVE - INSTALLA- 21-23-01-400-802-A EMB-135 TION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General CONFIG-2 21-23-01 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 21-23-01-000-802-A EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 2. GASPER SHUTOFF VALVE - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the gasper shutoff valve. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-02/100 - AMM TASK 53-01-02-000-802-A/400 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 251 251HF Passenger cabin floor 252 252DF Passenger cabin floor D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Under the passenger cabin floor I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-018-A (1) On the overhead circuit breaker panel, open the GASPER FAN circuit breaker and attach a DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to it. (2) Remove the floor access panels 251HF and 252DF (AMM MPP 06-41-02/100 and AMM TASK 53-01-02-000-802-A/400). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-010-A (1) On aircraft s/n 145 thru 271: EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 CONFIG-2 21-23-01 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (a) Disconnect the electrical connector (4). (b) Remove the clamps (2). (c) Remove the adhesive tapes (1). (d) Remove the gasper valve (3). (2) On aircraft s/n 272 and on: (a) Disconnect the electrical connector (5). (b) Remove the clamps (3). (c) Remove the tiedown straps (1). (d) Remove the hoses (2). (e) Remove the gasper valve (4). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 CONFIG-2 21-23-01 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

TIEDOWN STRAP (2) DUCT (REF.) 1 DET. B 2 DET. AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 21-23-01-400-802-A EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 3. GASPER SHUTOFF VALVE - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the gasper shutoff valve. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-02/100 - AMM TASK 53-01-02-400-802-A/400 - IPC 21-23-00 GASPER C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 251 251HF Passenger cabin floor 252 252DF Passenger cabin floor D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) KB42/75 - 75 mm (2.95 in) Adhesive Tape AR G. Expendable Parts IPC REFERENCE ITEM QTY (VENDOR REFERENCE) Tiedown strap IPC 21-23-00 4 H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Under the passenger cabin floor I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-019-A (1) On the overhead circuit breaker panel, make sure that the GASPER FAN circuit breaker is open and with a DO-NOT-CLOSE tag attached to it. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-802-A/400 CONFIG-2 21-23-01 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-010-A (1) On aircraft s/n 145 thru 271: (a) Put the gasper valve (3) in the installation position. (b) Attach the gasper valve (3) to the conditioned air ducts (REF.) with five turns of adhesive tape (1). (c) Install the clamps (2). (d) Connect the electrical connector (4). (2) On aircraft s/n 272 and on: (a) Connect the hoses (2) to the gasper valve (4) and to the conditioned air ducts (REF.). (b) Install the clamps (3). (c) Install the tiedown straps (1). (d) Connect the electrical connector (5). K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-010-A (1) Install the floor access panels 251HF and 252DF (AMM MPP 06-41-02/100 and AMM TASK 53-01-02-400-802-A/400). (2) On the overhead circuit breaker panel, remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from the GASPER FAN circuit breaker and close it. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-802-A/400 CONFIG-2 21-23-01 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
